class.name: Pladin
class.hitpoint_per_level: d10 + CON modifier or 6 + CON modifier

features.name: Lay on hands
features.desc: You have healing power that refreshes when doing a long rest. With this power you can restore a number of HP equal to 5x your paladin level. Using a bonus action you can heal a creature you touch (until you are out of HP healing energy). You can also use 5 HP to remove the poisoned condition from creatures

features.name: Spellcasting
features.desc: You know how to cast spells by praying. You can use spells on the paladin spell list

feature_data.name: Spell slots
feature_data.desc: You have limited amounts of spell slots. See your paladin's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have

feature_data.name: Prepared spells of level 1+
feature_data.desc: You prepare a list of lvl 1+ spells available to you. See your paladin's level class features to see how many you're allowed to have prepared

feature_data.name: Replacing prepared spells
feature_data.desc: When you do a long rest, you can change one spell of your spell list with another one with the correct spell slot

feature_data.name: Spellcasting ability
feature_data.desc: You use CHA as your spellcasting ability

feature_data.name: Spellcasting focus
feature_data.desc: you can use a holy symbol for spellcasting

features.name: Weapon mastery
features.desc: You can use the mastery properties of two weapon types. You can swap these masteries after a long rest

features.name: Fighting style
features.desc: Gain a fighting style or choose the option below:

feature_data.name: Blessed warrior
feature_data.desc: You know two cleric cantrips which count as paladin spells for you. When you gain a paladin level you can change the chosen cantrips.

features.name: Paladin's smite
features.desc: You always know the Divine smite spell, which you can cast once per long rest without using a spell slot.

features.name: Paladin Subclass
features.desc: Gain a subclass for your paladin character

features.name: Channel divinity
features.desc: you can use divine energy to use magical effects. After expending you regain one use after a short rest and all after a long rest. Each time you use channel divinity you will be granted an effect. you start with just this one:

feature_data.name: Divine sense
feature_data.desc: Using a bonus action, you can know the position of celectials, fiends and undead creatures within 60ft of yourself.

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Extra attack
features.desc: You can do two attacks on your turn instead of one

features.name: Faithfull steed
features.desc: You always know the Find steed spell, which you can cast once per long rest without using a spell slot.

features.name: Aura of protection
features.desc: You and allies within 10ft of you gain your CHA modifier as a bonus on saving throws.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: Abjure foes
features.desc: Using a magic action, you can expend one channel divinity to target a number of creatures equal to your CHA modifier. They must succeed on a WIS saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute or until damaged. The targeted creatures can only move, take an action or a bonus action.

features.name: Aura of courage
features.desc: You and allies are immune to being frightened while in your aura of protection

features.name: Radiant strikes
features.desc: When attacking a creature with a weapon or an unarmed strike and hitting it, the target takes an extra 1d8 of radiant damage

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't gain additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Restoring touch
features.desc: You can remove one of these conditions when using lay on hands: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralised or stunned. Just like poisoned, you have to use 5 HP for this which then can't be used to restore HP of the creature anymore.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Ability score improvement
features.desc: Improve your Ability Score or choose another feat you qualify for

features.name: You don't gain additional features
features.desc: read the title

features.name: Optional subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass (only for some subclasses)

features.name: Aura expansion
features.desc: Your aura of protection range becomes 30ft

features.name: Epic boon
features.desc: You gain an Epic Boon feat or another feat you qualify for.

features.name: Subclass feature
features.desc: Gain a subclass feature of your subclass

features.name: Oath of the ancients spells
features.desc: You always know the following spells:

feature_data.name: 3rd
feature_data.desc: You know these spells: Ensnaring strike, Speak with animals

feature_data.name: 5th
feature_data.desc: You know these spells: Misty step, Moonbeam

feature_data.name: 9th
feature_data.desc: You know these spells: Plant growth, Protection from energy

feature_data.name: 13th
feature_data.desc: You know these spells: Ice storm, Stone skin

feature_data.name: 17th
feature_data.desc: You know these spells: Commune with nature, Tree stride

features.name: Nature's wrath
features.desc: Using a magic action, you can expend one channel divinity to summon spectral vines around creatures within 15ft. they must succeed on a STR saving throw or be restrained for a minute. on each turn the creature has to make the save again, only freeing themselves on a success
